name: perplexity
description: Ask questions and have conversations with Perplexity AI. Get web-backed answers with real-time search capabilities.

metadata.short_description: Ask questions and have conversations with Perplexity AI with web-backed answers.
metadata.mesh_description: The Perplexity AI MCP provides comprehensive integration with Perplexity's AI search engine, enabling intelligent question-answering with real-time web search capabilities. This MCP allows AI agents to ask questions and get factual, up-to-date answers backed by web sources, have multi-turn conversations with context retention, control search parameters like domain filters and recency, and choose from various models including sonar, sonar-pro, and sonar-reasoning. The integration is perfect for research tasks, fact-checking, getting current information, and building intelligent assistants that need access to real-time web knowledge. Ideal for teams and individuals who need AI-powered research capabilities, accurate information retrieval, or want to augment their applications with web-backed AI responses. Authentication is done via API key passed in the Authorization header.
